org.opends.dsml.protocol

Class DSMLExtendedOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.dsml.protocol.DSMLExtendedOperation

  • public class DSMLExtendedOperation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the functionality for the performing an LDAP EXTENDED operation based on the specified DSML request.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DSMLExtendedOperation(LDAPConnection connection, java.util.Set<java.lang.String> stringResponses)
      Create an instance with the specified LDAP connection.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.opends.dsml.protocol.ExtendedResponse doOperation(org.opends.dsml.protocol.ObjectFactory objFactory, org.opends.dsml.protocol.ExtendedRequest extendedRequest, java.util.List<Control> controls)
      Perform the LDAP EXTENDED operation and send the result back to the client.
      boolean responseIsString(java.lang.String oid)
      Determine if the response to a given LDAP extended operation (specified by OID) should be treated as a string.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DSMLExtendedOperation

        public DSMLExtendedOperation(LDAPConnection connection,
                     java.util.Set<java.lang.String> stringResponses)
        Create an instance with the specified LDAP connection.
        Parameters:
        connection - The LDAP connection to send the request on.
        stringResponses - The OIDs of any operations that have results that should be returned as strings instead of binary.

    • Method Detail

      • responseIsString

        public boolean responseIsString(java.lang.String oid)
        Determine if the response to a given LDAP extended operation (specified by OID) should be treated as a string. The default is binary.
        Parameters:
        oid - The OID of the extended operation.
        Returns:
        true if the extended operation is known to return a string, false otherwise.

      • doOperation

        public org.opends.dsml.protocol.ExtendedResponse doOperation(org.opends.dsml.protocol.ObjectFactory objFactory,
                                                    org.opends.dsml.protocol.ExtendedRequest extendedRequest,
                                                    java.util.List<Control> controls)
                                                      throws java.io.IOException,
                                                             LDAPException,
                                                             ASN1Exception
        Perform the LDAP EXTENDED operation and send the result back to the client.
        Parameters:
        objFactory - The object factory for this operation.
        extendedRequest - The extended request for this operation.
        controls - Any required controls (e.g. for proxy authz).
        Returns:
        The result of the extended operation.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O problem occurs.
        LDAPException - If an error occurs while interacting with an LDAP element.
        ASN1Exception - If an error occurs while interacting with an ASN.1 element.
